option.name: PROGRAM_PARAMETERS
option.value: curl https://github.com/BepInEx/BepInEx/releases/download/v5.4.17/BepInEx_x86_5.4.17.0.zip -o .cache/BepInEx_x86_5.4.17.0.zip; tar -xf .cache/BepInEx_x86_5.4.17.0.zip -C .cache/Inscryption; Remove-Item .cache/BepInEx_x86_5.4.17.0.zip; Remove-Item .cache/Inscryption/changelog.txt; New-Item -Force -ItemType directory -Path .cache/Inscryption/BepInEx/config | Out-Null; Copy-Item .run/BepInEx.cfg -Destination .cache/Inscryption/BepInEx/config
